data.title: Leipzig, Germany
data.meta_description: May weather for Leipzig, Germany: On the first day of May in Leipzig, Germany, sunrise is at 05:41 and sunset at 20:33. In Leipzig, in May, during 9.8 rainfall days, 24mm (0.94") of precipitation is typically accumulated.
data.text:
Average high temperature in May: 18.3°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is August (24.9°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (2.4°C).

Average low temperature in May: 7.8°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is August (15.1°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (-2.1°C).

Average snowfall in May

Leipzig, Germany

Average snowfall in May: 0mm

The month with the highest snowfall is January (31mm).

The months with the least snowfall are May, June, July, August, September and October (0mm).

Average snowfall days in May

Leipzig, Germany

Average snowfall days in May: 0 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (6.9 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are May, June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

Average daylight in May /

Average sunshine in May

Leipzig, Germany

Average daylight in May: 15h and 4min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 16h and 30min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 0min).

Average sunshine in May: 9h and 0min

The month with the most sunshine is August (Average sunshine: 10h and 18min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 3h and 30min).
